snippet: DOSHI--Shrenik Ramaniklal. After a struggle with leukemia, Shrenik Ramaniklal Doshi passed away in New York, NY on Friday, January 1, 2016. He was 71 years old. As president of Jewelex New York, he was a pioneer in the diamond industry. His charisma, generosity, and compassion drew many friends who will miss him dearly. He leaves behind a loving family that will carry on his tradition of exceptional philanthropy. He is survived by his wife, Rupa Doshi and his son and daughter-in-law, Nirav and Alma Doshi. 1/3
lead_paragraph: DOSHI--Shrenik Ramaniklal. After a struggle with leukemia, Shrenik Ramaniklal Doshi passed away in New York, NY on Friday, January 1, 2016. He was 71 years old. As president of Jewelex New York, he was a pioneer in the diamond industry. His charisma, generosity, and compassion drew many friends who will miss him dearly. He leaves behind a loving family that will carry on his tradition of exceptional philanthropy. He is survived by his wife, Rupa Doshi and his son and daughter-in-law, Nirav and Alma Doshi. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  DOSHI, SHRENIK RAMANIKLAL
